removals.replacement: dot + A[i * nk + k] * B[k * nj + j]
removals.reasoning: Outer grouping around the sum and inner grouping around the product are unnecessary; * has higher precedence than +. Parentheses inside array subscripts are also unnecessary
Parentheses inside array subscript are unnecessary; [] already delimit the index and * binds tighter than +
Wrapping the entire right-hand side in parentheses is unnecessary; operator precedence is unambiguous here
